item.title: Game Description
item.description: This article will be continuously updated to reflect changes in the game and to be aligned with other aticles.

item.title: Game Loop
item.description: Before I provide you with a definition of a Game Loop I would like to look at some corner concepts. What is a Computer Program? What a strange question? Everyone knows the answer! I can agree with that statement, but do you really know what computer program is in essence? After ten years in software development and thousands lines of code I’m re-thinking this question. A computer program is a collection of instructions that perform a specific task when executed by a computer.

In augue nisl, vestibulum commodo est a, tristique porttitor est. Proin laoreet iaculis ornare. Nullam ut neque quam.

Welcom to my blog! My name is Alexander Krupsky. I have worked as a SharePoint Tech Lead and .Net Solution Architect for a couple of the last years. I have had a lot of amaizing opportunities and great projects that allowed me to improve my knowladge and skills in wide range of fields. But, I have figured out that inspite of my good understanding of high-level design concepts I have a lack in low-level implementation details.
